sentences.en: Atheists and theists live together peacefully and amiably in this country.
sentences.cn: 无神论者和有神论者在该国和睦相处.

sentences.en: Except for traffic noise the night passed peacefully.
sentences.cn: 除了车流的噪音，那一晚过得很平静。

sentences.en: He closed his eyes to put a stop to all distracting thoughts, sitting there quietly and peacefully.
sentences.cn: 他闭了眼睛,息了杂念, 平心静气地坐着.

sentences.en: He died peacefully on December 10 after a short illness.
sentences.cn: 他在一场短病后于12月10日安详地离开了人世。

sentences.en: He lives straight and peacefully with his neighbours.
sentences.cn: 他和他的邻居坦诚而和睦地住在一起.

sentences.en: Her son was lying peacefully on his back.
sentences.cn: 她儿子安静地仰面躺着。

sentences.en: The crowd dispersed peacefully after prayers.
sentences.cn: 祈祷仪式过后，人们静静散去。

sentences.en: The old man passed away peacefully.
The older three girls are still slumbering peacefully.
sentences.cn: 稍大的3个女孩还在安静地睡着。

sentences.en: The plane glided peacefully and its wings gleamed white.
sentences.cn: 这飞机平稳地滑行,机翼泛着白光.

sentences.en: Then conscience granted a truce, and these curiously inconsistent pirates fell peacefully to sleep.
sentences.cn: 后来良心同意跟他们和解了, 这两个令人费解而又矛盾重重的海盗才心安理得地睡着了.

sentences.en: These curiously inconsistent pirates fell peacefully to sleep.
sentences.cn: 这些稀奇自相矛盾的海盗也就安心地睡觉了.

sentences.en: They've been living and working peacefully with members of various ethnic groups.
sentences.cn: 他们和不同民族的人们一起和睦地生活和工作。

sentences.en: We want to get to Western standards of living, but to do it all peacefully.
sentences.cn: 我们希望达到西方的生活标准，但是一切要和平地进行。

sentences.en: Would she wake to find Gaston sleeping peacefully at her side?
sentences.cn: 她醒来会发现加斯顿安详地睡在她身旁吗？

sentences.en: You can peacefully send her on to the next life.
sentences.cn: 你可以心情平静地把卡西送往另一个世界。

words.tran_cn: 和平的，爱好和平的；平静的
